bpi.most.server.model

Class DpController

  • java.lang.Object
    • bpi.most.server.model.DpController

  • public class DpController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles instantiation of requested datapoints. Caches datapoints for performance optimization.
    Author:
    robert.zach@tuwien.ac.at
